name: Farmer Nathan's Field
description:
Bluejay Studios presents Farmer Nathan's Field. This game is a simple and fun farming simulator game. This game has fun 3D graphics and a lot of content to play with. This is a simple game that you play to pass time and just to get the satisfaction of completing everything.

At the beginning of the game, there is a tutorial for people who need help figuring out the game mechanics at the beginning of the game. The graphics in this game is very simple and nice to look at which provides an enjoyable experience for the game. The self-made soundtrack also complements this. For people that like to complete everything, there are achievements for you to collect throughout your play session.

There is no website to see all of our projects at the moment. If you would like to see more of the games then they are all viewable on itch.io. This game is planned to be ported to school-friendly gaming platforms and IOS and Android.
